column4: Hey guys, under ubuntu breezy, how do I either lock the keyboard, or lock the computer so my aps stay running, but keyboard input wont destroy my pages when the cat walks on the keyboard?
If you go into System>Preferences>Keyboard Shortcuts, you can set a keyboard combo to "Lock Screen". I have mine set to ctrl+alt+delete
Not entirely, you have to type your password in so locking the KB would be a bad thing.
